Name: Old Future: Post-Apocalyptic Times
About the game: 'Welcome to the OLD Future , a post-apocalyptic indie survival game set in a Sand-Box world inspired by classic dystopic games we all grew up with. Early Access Content Status: 'In 1959 the Western Block and the Soviet Union initiated the M.A.D. (Mutually Assured Destruction) Protocol. A world technologically raised on the power of the Atom cease to exist in one afternoon... You find yourself stranded in the future looking for hidden gems in the ruins of a world long gone. Game Features: Inventory & gear Crafting & survival Weapons, upgrades & various ammo. Traders, beasts & AI House building, upgrades & locks Nature biomes: Nuclear winter, Wasteland, Paradise Multicamera & Minimap Local & Internet Multiplayer Friends, this is a Solo Dev project, I answer and appreciate all feedback! Full time development of the project started in January 2021 Please join me in making this game a reality.
